response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special price. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $1,200,000. This price not only ensures you receive significant savings but also secures a high-quality asset that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
